mapper.sql: id, type_code, type_name, value_id, value_name, created_by, creation_date, modify_by, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into data_dictionary (type_code, type_name, value_id, value_name, created_by, creation_date, modify_by, modify_date) values (#{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into data_dictionary
type_code,
type_name,
value_id,
value_name,
created_by,
creation_date,
modify_by,
modify_date,

mapper.update:
update data_dictionary
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
value_name = #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update data_dictionary set type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, value_name = #{valueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT value_id,value_name from data_dictionary where type_code='APP_STATUS'
